title: Comprehensive Mixed Martial Arts (MMA) Training Design Utilizing Ecological Dynamics

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Beginner-tailored MMA training environment emphasizing situational learning experiences simulating actual competition scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can develop motor skills that flexibly adapt to changing situations by applying ecological dynamics principles.
Learners can generate coordinated movement patterns in a PBL training scenario with constraints (space, counterparts, rules, etc.).
Learners can analyze problems arising during the training process and create a portfolio evaluating optimal action strategies for situational contexts.

resources: Adjustable Mat-Based Martial Arts Training Space

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
